item.title: Longevity in Nicoya
item.description: Nicoya is a district in the Guanacaste region of Costa Rica. It is famous for being one of the six world wide bluezones. A bluezone is a place on earth that has a significantly higher average life span compared to the rest of the world. Diet Centarians in Nicoya eat a diet that is distinctly different from a typical western diet. In the United States of America. People in Nicoya get most of the carbohydrates from grains, vegetables, and fruit, along with eating a large amount of dairy.
